title: About Manas
paragraphs: I'm Manas Behera - an author and corporate professional with nearly two decades of experience. I'm passionate about helping young minds grow through soft skills training designed for school and college students. If you're a student looking to build confidence, improve communication, and prepare to become job-ready, let's connect in the upcoming webinar.
Self-Improvement or Personal Development, Communication, Leadership, Problem-Solving, Emotional Intelligence, Resume Writing, Mock Interviews, Group Discussion and many more...
My goal is to help students achieve their goals.
